edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class MonitorReport

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.MonitorReport

public class MonitorReport
extends Object

Generates and sends report for monitor initiated through administration app once it is complete. This class is instantiated for each new monitor initiated through the administration app. It observes the status of the monitor, and once it is complete, generates a report for the monitor from the data collected in the database, and generates a notification with the option to send or save the report if this option was selected.

Author:
darts
See Also:
CimonListView
